00003 !
00008 module geometry
00009 
00010   implicit none
00011 
00012   private
00013 
00014   public :: read_geometry
00015 
00016   !=============================================================================
00019   type, public :: geometry_type
00020     integer :: n_slabs          ! number of sub-slabs
00021     double precision :: length  ! length of slab
00022     double precision :: dx      ! length of a sub-slab 
00023   end type geometry_type
00024 
00025 contains
00026 
00027   !=============================================================================
00032   subroutine read_geometry(this)
00033 
00034     type(geometry_type), intent(inout) :: this
00035 
00036     ! ask user for length of slab
00037     write(*,*) 'Enter the length of the slab:'
00038     read(*,*) this%length
00039 
00040     ! ask user for number of sub-slabs
00041     write(*,*) 'How many tally regions?'
00042     read(*,*) this%n_slabs
00043 
00044     ! calculate dx
00045     this%dx = this%length/this%n_slabs
00046 
00047   end subroutine read_geometry
00048 
00049 end module geometry
